patch plugin.js:42 
static patch(proto: object, name: string, fn: Function) → {}

patch a melonJS function


 // redefine the me.game.update function with a new one
 me.plugin.patch(me.game, "update", function () {
   // display something in the console
   console.log("duh");
   // call the original me.game.update function
   this._patched();
 });
Parameters:

proto object

target object
name string

target function

register plugin.js:86 
static register(pluginObj: plugin.Base, name: string) → {}

Register a plugin.


 // register a new plugin
 me.plugin.register(TestPlugin, "testPlugin");
 // the plugin then also become available
 // under then me.plugins namespace
 me.plugins.testPlugin.myfunction ();
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
pluginObj plugin.Base

Plugin object to instantiate and register
name string
...arguments object

<optional>

all extra parameters will be passed to the plugin constructor
